summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3153 for the improvement of Thirty-fifth Avenue Southwest, from Manning Street to West Morgan Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 38505, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
